message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12000. This is a great deal considering its value to you.  Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but $12000 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $9000.

Bob, I appreciate your interest. While $9000 is a bit lower than I'd hoped for, I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $10500? This would still leave some room for both of us to benefit from the deal.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $10500 is still a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $9500. This is my final offer, I'm willing to walk away if we can't agree on a price.
